abstract: Retirement plans can now offer investment advice, as long as they satisfy certain rules set out by the Labor Department.
snippet: Retirement plans can now offer investment advice, as long as they satisfy certain rules set out by the Labor Department.
lead_paragraph: Some big retirement plans offer investors the chance to hire an independent adviser that can help them choose their investments. But your plan provider will soon be able to offer the advice itself, as long as it meets rules issued recently by the Department of Labor.

headline.main: Retirement Plan Providers Can Now Offer Own Advice
